beginPan.content:
beginPan(u, v)→ None: Begin a pan at at the given u and v.
m.beginPan(.1, .2)

beginRotate.content:
beginRotate(u, v)→ None: Begin an arcball rotation at the given u and v.
m.beginRotate(.1, .2)

beginDolly.content:
beginDolly(u, v)→ None: Begin a dolly at at the given u and v.
m.beginDolly(.1, .2)

pan.content:
pan(u, v)→ None: Pan the view by the given x and y.
m.pan(.1, .2)

panTo.content:
panTo(u, v, scale=1.0)→ None: Pan from the u,v given in the last call to beginPan() to the given u and v, applying a scale as well to the pan amount.
scale - (Keyword, Optional) Scale the operation by this amount.
m.panTo(.1, .2)

rotateTo.content:
rotateTo(u, v, scale=1.0)→ None: Rotates the arcball to the given u and v position.
scale - (Keyword, Optional) Scale the operation by this amount.
m.rotateTo(.1, .2)

dolly.content:
dolly(z)→ None: Dolly the view by the given z value.
m.dolly(.3)

dollyTo.content:
dollyTo(u, v, scale=1.0)→ None: Dolly from the u,v given in the last call to beginDolly() to the given u and v, applying a scale as well to the dolly amount.(Keyword, Optional)
scale - Scale the operation by this amount.
m.dollyTo(.1, .2)

transform.content:
transform()→ tdu.Matrix: Gets the current transform matrix for the arcball.
m.transform()

setTransform.content:
setTransform(matrix)→ None: Sets the current transform matrix for the arcball. Scales in the given matrix will be ignored.
m.setTransform(m)

identity.content:
identity()→ None: Resets all values of the ArcBall to the default state.
m.identity() TouchDesigner Build:
